definition: convert into soap by hydrolizing an ester into an acid and alcohol as a result of treating it with an alkali
details:
verb
- convert into soap by hydrolizing an ester into an acid and alcohol as a result of treating it with an alkali
= example: convert into soap by hydrolizing an ester into an acid and alcohol as a result of treating it with an alkali
- become converted into soap by being hydrolized into an acid and alcohol as a result of being treated with an alkali
